pageTitle: Common Names for Blacktip Reef Shark (Carcharhinus melanopterus) - Encyclopedia of Life
textBeforeTable: English marks the preferred name for each language. Common names listed by language 32 synonyms 180 common names 4 related names 9 classifications Many people know organisms only by the common names, or "vernacular" names. Unlike scientific names, common names are almost always different for speakers of different languages. They may also vary regionally within a language. This tab shows all the common names provided to EOL for this organism from a variety of providers, including EOL curators. Currently we can only set one preferred common name per language on a given EOL page, but all the names should be searchable.
